      • installSystemCertificationAuthority

        public int installSystemCertificationAuthority(@NotNull
                                               java.lang.String filePath,
                                               @NotNull
                                               java.lang.String fileName)

        Method to install any package that is supported by device.

        Parameters:
        filePath - path to the certificate file, without trailing char '/'
        fileName - name of the file without its extension. Its the manufacturer's responsibility to append the correct extension to it Example: filePath = /sdcard/stone-files, fileName = stone-internal-ca The terminal "exampleA" supports .cer, so the ExampleAHal must read the file /sdcard/stone-files/stone-internal-ca.cer
        Returns:
        The error code referenced in br.com.stone.posandroid.hal.api.InstallerErrorCode. The successful installation of this package will reboot the device
